Shr 1.54 dlrs vs 1.27 dlrs Net 7,065,000 vs 5,812,000 Nine mths Shr 4.25 dlrs vs 3.40 dlrs Net 19.5 mln vs 15.6 mln Assets 2.84 billion vs 1.87 billion Deposits 2.51 billion vs 1.67 billion
